subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Duke’s Mason Plumlee stands out in the N.C.A.A. tournament simply because he is among a few practitioners of a shot that is difficult to guard: the hook shot.
snippet: Duke’s Mason Plumlee stands out in the N.C.A.A. tournament simply because he is among a few practitioners of a shot that is difficult to guard: the hook shot.
